archiefmat.titel: Rapporten van de raad-fiscaal betreffende het aantal gevangenen per maand
archiefmat.titel_eng: Monthly reports of the Councillor-fiscal concerning the number of prisoners
archiefmat.scope: These reports contain names and surnames of prisoners and information on their place of birth, age, religion, date of detention and course of the trial.
archiefmat.notes: See for the period August 1822 - June 1831: 1.05.12.02 archives of Curaçao, Bonaire and Aruba after 1828, no. 68.
